<!-- This page assembles the email address at runtime to reduce scraping. -->

<p><strong>Email address:</strong> <a id="email-link"></a></p>
<p style="font-size:0.9em; margin-top:0.5em;">I check emails strictly during business hours and may take 24–48 hours to respond to a query. If I have not responded to your query within 48 hours, please feel free to follow up.</p>

<script>
